attributes.action: Limit the massive cost increase on motor insurance.
attributes.additional_details: To put max limit of £1,500 for Young Drivers between 16 - 25 years old.
attributes.background: To put max limit on how much young drivers should be charged by Insurance companies.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Introduce fixed prices for car insurance based on power to weight ratio and age: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/646793

Place a Cap on Motor Insurance Premium Increases: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/649918

Establish a Commission to investigate extortionate Car Insurance price rises: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/644067
